schema.title: Schema
schema.description: A valid JSON Schema to use for the editor. Version 3 and Version 4 of the draft specification are supported.

ajax.title: Ajax
ajax.description: If true, JSON Editor will load external URLs in $ref via ajax.

disable_array_add.title: Disable array add
disable_array_add.description: If true, remove all `add row` buttons from arrays.

disable_array_delete.title: Disable array delete
disable_array_delete.description: If true, remove all `delete row` buttons from arrays.

disable_array_reorder.title: Disable array reorder
disable_array_reorder.description: If true, remove all `move up` and `move down` buttons from arrays.

disable_collapse.title: Disable collapse
disable_collapse.description: If true, remove all collapse buttons from objects and arrays.

disable_edit_json.title: Disable edit json
disable_edit_json.description: If true, remove all Edit JSON buttons from objects.

disable_properties.title: Disable properties
disable_properties.description: If true, remove all Edit Properties buttons from objects.

form_name_root.title: Form name root
form_name_root.description: The first part of the `name` attribute of form inputs in the editor. An full example name is `root[person][name]` where `root` is the form_name_root.

iconlib.title: Iconlib
iconlib.description: The icon library to use for the editor. See the CSS Integration section below for more info.

no_additional_properties.title: No additional properties
no_additional_properties.description: If true, objects can only contain properties defined with the properties keyword.

refs.title: Refs
refs.description: An object containing schema definitions for URLs. Allows you to pre-define external schemas.

required_by_default.title: Required by default
required_by_default.description: If true, all schemas that don't explicitly set the required property will be required.

show_errors.title: Show errors
show_errors.description: When to show validation errors in the UI. Valid values are interaction, change, always, and never.

startval.title: Start value
startval.description: Seed the editor with an initial value. This should be valid against the editor's schema.

template.title: Template
template.description: The JS template engine to use. See the Templates and Variables section below for more info.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: The CSS theme to use. See the CSS Integration section below for more info.
